r.d: This extension allows php applications to communicate with any Stomp compliant Message Brokers through easy object oriented and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Fixed bug #16936 (Module segfaults on readFrame if Frame > STOMP_BUFSIZE) - Fixed bug #16933 (readFrame does not notice when server shuts down) - Fixed bug #16930 (readFrame reports error-frames as "timeout")
